pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, November 9, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will receive his bivalent COVID-19 booster dose and the seasonal flu shot at a pharmacy.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

The Prime Minister will chair a meeting of the Incident Response Group on the situation in Haiti.
